## Description
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

## Current Behavior
Describe the current behavior and explain why it doesn't meet your needs.

## Proposed Solution
Describe the solution or feature you'd like to see implemented.

## Alternative Solutions
Describe any alternative solutions or workarounds you've considered.

## Use Cases
Describe the use cases that would benefit from this feature.

## Example
Provide an example of how this feature would be used.

## Additional Context
Add any other context, screenshots, or information about the feature request.

## Priority
- [ ] Critical - Blocks my workflow
- [ ] High - Would significantly improve my experience
- [ ] Medium - Nice to have improvement
- [ ] Low - Minor enhancement
